head.name: equip_tinFoilHat
head.description: A very shiny and very reflective tin foil hat made from premium, high-grade, somewhat ethically-sourced Costco aluminum foil.
head.effect: Gives a 10% chance to reflect any item used on you back to the user.

body.name: equip_pokemonHoodie
body.effect: Gain 15% criticial hit chance when using usable items that have a crit effect.

trinket.name: equip_pocketPaul
trinket.description: Your very own miniature Paul who will constantly spam the Pick Up Edbucks button alongside you.
trinket.effect: Gives a 25% chance to double edbucks gained when clicking the Pickup Edbucks button.

trinket.name: equip_megaphone
trinket.description: This technically counts as being extra active at the cost of everyone else's eardrums.
trinket.effect: Gives a 25% chance to gain 1 extra edbuck when awarded for being in an active voice chat.

trinket.name: equip_taxEvasion
trinket.description: Surely the IRS won't notice a few missing edbucks from your taxes right?
trinket.effect: Gain 1 extra edbuck when receiving a valid edbuck reaction on your message.

shoes.name: equip_crocs
shoes.description: Garner enough sympathy from the store clerk over your poor choice of footwear that he'll offer you a store-wide discount.
shoes.effect: Get a 20% discount when buying usable items from the store.
